excerpt: Bitcoin hit an all time high last week.

children.text: Bitcoin hit an all time high last week.
It occurred to me that if all I’d done in October 2013 was drop out of my last year of college and spend what I’d save on a hundred bitcoins, I’d be a millionaire by now.
Of course, no one knew that Bitcoin would hit an all time high at all. Least of not then, back when it was an obscure triviality along the outskirts of the long tail.

Sometimes people make informed decisions based on what the know or care to find out. For everything else there’s luck. And only sometimes does it go in your favor.
